title: Contact Sync Issue- Only want ONE account to show
content: I have multiple email accounts on my device. I want only ONE of them to display and sync contacts. Even when un-selecting the "sync" feature for the other accounts, they still show up. I deleted the accounts, re-added them, then immediately turned on airplane mode, un-selected the sync feature, but as soon as I turn on airplane mode, they sync.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
